Producer: Sidney Kimmel, Jessica Elbaum, Adam McKay, Will Ferrell
Production Co: Sidney Kimmel Entertainment, Gloria Sanchez Productions
Rating: R (Sexual References|Language|Some Drug Use|Strong Sexual Content)
Synopsis: Twelve years after a one-night stand, a man (Jason Sudeikis) and a woman (Alison Brie) run into each other and try to maintain a platonic relationship despite their mutual attraction.
Title: Sleeping With Other People
